statements: DELETE FROM GentrificationImpact WHERE city_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM GentrificationImpact WHERE city_id = 1 AND city_name = 'New York'
DELETE FROM impact_of_gentrification WHERE city = 'New York' AND housing_price > 100000.00;
DELETE FROM gentrification_trends WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND trend_year < 2010;
DELETE FROM gentrification WHERE city = 'New York' AND neighborhood = 'Brooklyn';
DELETE FROM housing_prices WHERE city = 'New York' AND year < 2015;
DELETE FROM gentrification WHERE impact_rating > 8 AND gentrification_year = 2020;
DELETE FROM economic_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND year = 2020;
